scripts.test-report: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/*.json -o cypress/results/index.json && npx marge cypress/results/index.json
scripts.test-and-report: npx cypress run --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir="cypress/results",overwrite=false,html=true,json=true && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/*.json -o cypress/results/index.json && npx marge cypress/results/index.json
